
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
  exec.sum.text <- readLines("../../../master/Skip_Year_Analysis/SGP_Report/Executive_Summary_Text.Rmd")
  text.to.replace <- unique(do.call(rbind, str_match_all(exec.sum.text, "XXX__\\s*(.*?)\\s*__XXX")))

  for (i in seq(nrow(text.to.replace))) exec.sum.text <- gsub(text.to.replace[i,1], eval(parse(text=paste0("params[['", text.to.replace[i,2], "']]"))), exec.sum.text, fixed=TRUE)
```

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, Exec_Summary}
  cat(exec.sum.text, sep = "\n")
```
